sense.name: to engage in plotting or activities of an illegal or deceitful nature
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] CONSPIRE (ADVP)] NP1{actor} CONSPIRE WITH NP2{actor} NP1 CONSPIRE AGAINST NP2[patient] Includes: CONSPIRE WITH
sense.examples: Birds of a feather, conspire together. They're all conspiring against me!
